name: [sleep debt]
description:
Made by WR41THX and JDEV for the GDB Juice Jam 2 (electric buggaloo).

https://itch.io/jam/gdb-juice-jam-ii

You've been staying up too late every night this week.  That lack of sleep will really catch up to you, ya know?  At least you don't have to pay interest on *drops microphone*.....sleep debt.

Driving: WASD ( no license required, it's a dream)

Platforming: A and D to move horizontally, space to jump. 

Get Stuck?  Press "U" to reset back in your car at the center of the overworld.

Need to get your bearings?  Press M for the map.

Click "VISIT HUB" on the top right to  see your collection progress and eventually WAKE UP.  

Bottom right controls the radio when you're in the car.  You can also press "R" to change tracks.

Pay off your debt, find the dungeons, drive around and enjoy the silly thing WR41THX and JDEV created.  (Special Guest - The Greater Catsby as....the Greater Catsby)

JDEV's Page:  https://just-jdep.itch.io/
